ygData.subject: RE: re: New NPC in Highpass? (off-topic & possible spo iler)
ygData.msgSnippet: I had a run in with Nix last night.  I think a dark elf needs to talk to him... I popped out of the water to see him standing right in front of me.  Having
ygData.messageBody:
I had a run in with Nix last night. I think a dark elf needs to talk to
him...

I popped out of the water to see him standing right in front of me. Having
never seen him before I was thinking, "huh, a pc Dark Elf down here all
alone..." Then he screams something like "You must give me the
[eye]..etc". It's interesting to note that the word eye is in
brackets...like he has a quest for me. Too bad he immediately started
casting spells on me...I wanted to talk.

If there are any dark elves out there...see if Nixx has anything interesting
to say.

Ruldaas

>Ok, there is some RP connections to these guys??? The one is HH is new to
>me but there are several others - many pretty well known:
>
>Dvinn in Crushbone
>Dorn in North Ro
>Gix in West Commons
>Nixx in Paw
>Lord Grimlot in South Karana ?
>
>I'd love to know the story behind them. Perhaps a DE needs to visit each
>and have some chat?
>
>Sylly.
>
>
